product_name: Leki Naya SpeedLock Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Leki Naya SpeedLock trekking poles for women feature a powerful locking system for reliable strength, performance and convenience on your backcountry treks. SpeedLock is a powerful external locking system that activates quickly and easily-even when you're wearing thick gloves. Integrated, stainless-steel pressure plates provide a viselike clamp to hold pole sections in place. Sized for a woman's hands, soft rubber grips position the hands at an neutral, ergonomically correct 8deg angle for for optimal swing efficiency and stress relief. 3-section telescoping aluminum poles extend from 25.5 to 49.25 in. Synthetic tips with interchangeable baskets can flex up to 30deg, reducing stress to the pole shaft; durable carbide tip grip ice and rocks.
short_description: The Leki Naya SpeedLock trekking poles for women feature a powerful locking system for reliable strength, performance and convenience on your backcountry treks.
